CSvocab.VocabDefinition: Software that appears to be beneficial but is designed to violate security, tricks user and runs malware.
Virus that secretely records a users keystrokes.
where one of the conditions is a specific time or date.
designed to take control of the root account of a system.
Virus that threatens to lock a system or data unless a user pays
designed to show advertisements to a user without their permission.
Any software that harms are computer.
Uses multiple computers to flood servers with data packets.
